p: In contrast, the control group of PBS-treated mice infected with Cal-H1N1pdm2009 100% exhibited a BWL of more than 30% from day four to six p.i. resulting in euthanasia ( Figure 4a). The mortality rate in this control group was 29% four days p.i. and increased gradually to 85% at day 5 p.i., and 100% at 6 days p.i. ( Figure 4b). Mortality in the OMVs-empty group reached 57% at 13 days p.i. and resulted in euthanization of 4 mice (BWL â‰¥ 30%) ( Figure 4b).
